Developer and Mentor, Reahl

Ivan runs a small consultancy in South Africa, from which he mentors agile teams in the financial industry. This includes helping programmers to apply practices such as testing, pair programming and object oriented design within the context of existing systems that have grown convoluted and debilitating over time (something which makes the application of such practices challenging)

Interested to Speak at PyCon 2018?


We want you to submit a proposal. We are interested in a range of topics including web development, Design, Data Science, Networks and anything else related to Python
